title: Remove tooltips from three selected view mode buttons

requirements.text: Remove tooltips from the three view mode toggle buttons in the toolbar (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[3]/button[1], button[2], and button[3]). Keep all other button tooltips unchanged.

quotes: don't make any other changes and build!
I clearly wrote from which buttons to remove it - the selected ones - and I selected the buttons

acceptanceCriteria: The three selected view mode toggle buttons (button[1], button[2], button[3]) have no tooltips
Action buttons (download, link, move, delete) in file rows retain their tooltips
All other UI elements remain unchanged

constraints: Do not modify any UI elements except the three selected view mode buttons
Do not change action button tooltips
Do not change Type column styling
Do not change Actions column alignment
Do not modify any other design elements
nonGoals: Changing Type column from text to icons
Any other UI modifications beyond removing tooltips from the three selected buttons
